name: Catgeddon
description:
Tower defense game for a game jam!

You are super allergic to cats and all of a sudden the world is being invaded a giant horde of them! Build (inoffensive, I promise) towers to defend yourself and the world against them!

Jogo feito pra Trilha Game Jam 2021.

Autores:

Alexandre Pedroza - Programação

José Elyabe Sales De Oliveira - Música, efeitos sonoros e arte de título

Tiago Rosa Epaminondas - Arte e Game design
